title: 14 day ban for 1 game?
body: I got a 14 day ban for calling someone human garbage when they were trolling the shit out of me and I got tilted, how the hell is that fair?

replies.body:
The best way to protect yourself against a troll is to mute and report them.  By engaging with retaliation, you only run the chance of going down with them.  :(  Your chat also included racial slurs, negativity as soon as the match began, telling them to afk, claimed to have stopped playing yourself, and degrading others for the entirety of the match.  

All of this could have been stopped simply by using mute.  Based on the sevrity, a suspension was applied.  If you have any concerns or want more context, our PB team is available to you through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck!
